Clinic name: Chi Longevity at Four Seasons Singapore
Location (address): 190 Orchard Blvd, Singapore 248646 (Level 3, Four Seasons Hotel Singapore)
Short description (less than 160 charact: Medical‑grade healthy longevity clinic inside Four Seasons, offering evidence‑based diagnostics and personalized aging interventions.
Long description (500 characters): Chi Longevity at Four Seasons Singapore is a healthy longevity clinic offering evidence‑based, medically supervised programmes designed to slow biological aging and optimize long‑term well‑being. Located within Four Seasons Hotel Singapore, it provides advanced diagnostics—biological clocks, metabolic, cardiovascular, microbiome, and genetic testing—with personalized plans co‑created by multidisciplinary doctors, dietitians, psychologists, and health coaches.
USP 1 (description in less than 160 char: Advanced diagnostics (genetic, biological age, metabolic, microbiome) to create personalized longevity interventions.
USP 2 (description in less than 160 char: Guidance from doctors, dietitians, psychologists and health coaches led by Professor Andrea Maier.
USP 3 (description in less than 160 char: Premium clinic experience located within Four Seasons Hotel Singapore, with wellness cuisine collaboration.
Health and wellness approach (less than: The clinic uses precision longevity medicine—integrating genetic, biological age, metabolic, cardiovascular, microbiome and behavioural data—to assess clients’ biological aging process. Personalized interventions are designed by a multidisciplinary team to optimize cell function, resilience, stress, sleep and metabolic health, with continuous monitoring through data and coaching.
Nutrition approach (less than 500 charac: Nutrition is personalized based on DNA, blood and metabolic test outcomes, and designed by clinic dietitians. Clients receive longevity‑focused dietary guidance and can access specially curated wellness cuisine menu at the hotel’s Pool House restaurant.
Exclusive benefits when booking with Ser: Room upgrade (subject to availability), early check‑in/late check‑out, spa credit, VIP welcome and concierge assistance, with seamless arrangement of all clinic appointments.
Location highlights: Located on Orchard Boulevard inside Four Seasons Hotel; central to shopping, dining and wellness in Singapore’s luxury district.
Access: Easily accessible via car or taxi; central location near Orchard MRT; clinic on Level 3 of Four Seasons Hotel.
Family friendly ?: Yes – hotel is family friendly; clinic is adult‑focused, open to 18+ only.
Pet friendly ?: Yes – Four Seasons is pet‑friendly; clinic does not allow pets.
Booking and payment policy: Bookings via Serenity Ways or Four Seasons; clinic sessions booked directly through hotel concierge or separately.
Cancellation policy: Cancellations must be made at least 48 hours before appointment or full fees apply.
FAQ 1 - question: What types of programmes are available?
FAQ 1 - answer: Specialised programmes include Gene Insights, Biological Age Reveal, Body Recomposition, Glucose Navigator, Gut Health, Sleep & Stress, and Physical Performance.
FAQ 2 - question: Do I need a hotel stay to attend?
FAQ 2 - answer: No – clients can book clinic sessions independently, without a Four Seasons stay.
FAQ 3 - answer: The clinic is led by Professor Andrea Maier and supported by doctors, dietitians, psychologists and health coaches.
FAQ 4 - answer: Diagnostics include genetic testing, biological age clocks, blood, metabolic and cardiovascular assessments, microbiome analysis and continuous glucose monitoring.
FAQ 5 - question: Is the clinic open on weekends?
FAQ 5 - answer: Yes – clinic is open Monday to Friday (8:30–17:30) and Saturday (8:30–12:30); extended appointments can be arranged.
